```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
```
```{r read data}
ca_np <- read.csv(here("data", "ca_np.csv"))
ci_np <- read_xlsx(here("data", "ci_np.xlsx"))

```
# Our first plot

```{r plot1}
ggplot(data=ci_np, aes(x=year, y=visitors)) + geom_line()

```
